t: Question - Brand New PC randomly restarts with no error messages ? | Tom's Hardware Forum
s: Disabled "Restart if System Failure" setting. Checked Event Viewer but haven't seen anything that might indicate what's happening - not that I would know as I'm not tech savvy at all. Turned off all hibernation and sleep settings in Control Panel · Updating to the latest optional update for Windows Other fixes I've tried that I can't remember, I've been troubleshooting this for days now. Additionally, all my parts are brand new from Amazon...
